63  enum validBits
64  {
65  versionValid = 0x01,
66  runByValid = 0x02,
67  commentValid = 0x04,
68  sysValid = 0x08,
69 
70  timeSystemValid = 0x010,
71  leapSecondsValid = 0x020,
72  sysDCBValid = 0x040,
73  sysPCVValid = 0x080,
74 
75  numDataValid = 0x0100,

77  stationClockRefValid = 0x0400,
78  analysisCenterValid = 0x0800,
79 
80  numClockRefValid = 0x01000,
81  analysisClkRefrValid = 0x02000,
82  numReceiversValid = 0x04000,
83  solnStateValid = 0x08000,
84 
85  numSolnSatsValid = 0x010000,
86  prnListValid = 0x020000,
87  endOfHeaderValid = 0x040000,
88 
89  //allRequiredValid = 0x07F9A3, ///< this mask if for all required fields
90  //allRequiredValid = 0x07F903, ///< this mask if for all required fields
91  allRequiredValid = 0x07C903,
92  allValid = 0x07FFFF
93  };
